OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord weight loss past 6 month ( less 5 % v least 5 % ) disease stage ( stage IIIB pleural pericardial effusion pleural implant vs stage IV/recurrent ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive paclitaxel IV 3 hour follow carboplatin IV 15-30 minute day 1 . - Arm II : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 follow cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 . Treatment continue arm every 21 day 6 course absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter .
